us.pserver.revok

Class RemoteMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.pserver.revok.RemoteMethod

  • public class RemoteMethod
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a remote method to be invoked in a remote object. Contains informations about method name, object name, arguments and types.
    Version:
    1.1 - 201506
    Author:
    Juno Roesler - juno@pserver.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteMethod()
      Default Constructor without arguments.
      RemoteMethod(java.lang.String ownerObject, java.lang.String name)
      Constructor which receives object and method names.

      • setReturnVar

        public RemoteMethod setReturnVar(java.lang.String var)
        Set a variable in the server which will receive the returned value of the method. The variable name must start with '$' and contains the namespace, dot separeted (i.e: '$global.myvar').
        Parameters:
        var - Variable name.
        Returns:
        This modified RemoteMethod instance.

      • getReturnVar
